__IMPORTANT__: Fields starting and ending with double underscore (__) are only meant as comments and guides, these fields will be ignored and removed after the build process
__secondaryEmail__: (optional) can be set to string, null or undefined. Only used in Contact Me email CC
briefDescription: I am a fresh graduate with a background of software engineering. I am currently looking for oppotunities and currently working on personal projects as a hobby. During my free times, I enjoyed travelling and gardening
__links__: (optional) links if not relevant can be set to null or undefined. Otherwise, you can set any or all links (github, linkedin, twitter)

__experiences__.__description__: Required field, set it to an empty array 'experiences: []' if it is not relevant. This section will be hidden if it is set an empty array.
__experiences__.__small_screen__: Only the FIRST TWO experiences will be shown
__experiences__.__order__: Please ensure that the experiences are ordered in a reverse cronological order. Starting with the most recent
__experiences__.__field_yearEnd__: (optional) For experience that has no year end (such as your current work experience), either omit this field, set to undefined or null
__experiences__.__field_tags__: (optional) array of strings, can be set to undefined, null or []
__experiences__.__field_link__: (optional) set it to null or undefined, or omit the field entirely. The link will only be shown if the value is a string

highlights: Improved the performance by 23% in the last year
Gained an increase of unique visitors by 66% in 2020
Developed a filtering mechanism for the catalog page

__educations__.__description__: Required field, set it to an empty array 'educations: []' if it is not relevant. This section will be hidden if it is set an empty array.
__educations__.__order__: Please ensure that the educations are ordered in a reverse cronological order. Starting with the most recent
__educations__.__field_yearEnd__: (optional) For educations that has no year end (not graduated), either omit this field, set to undefined or null

educations.description: Graduated from a 3-years bachelor programme with a CGPA of 3.2 (total of 24 units) . Majoring in Web Development and had completed a Final Year Project of creating an HTML Game using Javascript, CSS and HTML
A one-year program as a part of a requirement to qualify into a bachelor programe in Australia

__projects__.__description__: Required field, set it to an empty array 'projects: []' if it is not relevant. This section will be hidden if it is set an empty array.
__projects__.__small_screen__: Only the FIRST TWO projects will be shown
__projects__.__order__: Please ensure that the projects are ordered in a reverse cronological order. Starting with the most recent
__projects__.__field_link__: (optional) set it to null or undefined, or omit the field entirely. The link will only be shown if the value is a string

projects.name: Project ABC

projects.name: Project Doodle
highlights: Analysed classical arts from all around the world including their aspects, monetary gains and cultural background using analytical tools
Part of a research project in the Arts and Culture Faculty

__skills__.__description__: Required field, set it to an empty array 'skills: []' if it is not relevant. This section will be hidden if it is set an empty array.
__skills__.__wide_screen__: Only the FIRST THREE skills will be shown
__skills__.__small_screen__: Only the FIRST THREE skills will be shown
__skills__.__field_icon__: (optional) Can be set to 'compter', 'book', 'film'. If set to null or undefined, the default icon shown will be 'film'

__reviews__.__description__: Required field, set it to an empty array 'reviews: []' if it is not relevant. This section will be hidden if it is set an empty array.
__reviews__.__small_screen__: Only the FIRST THREE reviews will be shown
